title: Current Market Structure/2022 Outlook with Avi Felman
description:
Blockware Lead Insights Analyst Will Clemente and Blocktower Capital Co-PM Avi Felman talk about managing a fund, current market structure, macro uncertainty, 2022 outlook and more for our weekly interview Podcast/YouTube channel series. Can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well!


Avi’s Twitter: twitter.com/AviFelman
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
